M 1 is the mass of G. quadriradiata under mixed culture or monoculture conditions. M 0 is the mass of G. quadriradiata in the one-plant pots. When calculated using data from the mixed culture treatments, the RII represents the intensity of inter-specific competition between the invasive and non-invasive species. When calculated using data from the monoculture treatments, the RII represents the intensity of intra-specific competition of G. quadriradiata. RII ranges from −1 to 1. if RII < 0, the plant experiences a negative impact from its competitor; if RII > 0, the plant experiences a positive impact from its competitor; if RII = 0, no impact is observed
44 .
